"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A small horn growing on the head of
a two-horned beast that is hiding within its hair.
When the large horn breaks, this horn immediately grows and becomes the new horn.

item.name: Stake of Wailing Night
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A stake driven into a corpse to prevent its reanimation.
It never rusts, and retains its luster by absorbing blood.
It can even pierce otherworldly beings that lurk in the dark of night.

item.name: Stake of Wailing Night
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A stake driven into a corpse to prevent its reanimation.
It never rusts, and retains its luster by absorbing blood.
It can even pierce otherworldly beings that lurk in the dark of night.

item.name: Soundless Bell
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
An enchanted bell made using the techniques of the sages. The sound it makes when rung is inaudible. It has a soothing effect, and can also control tractable animals such as horses.

item.name: Crystallized Lore
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A highly pure crystal of magic created
when human history crosses a stream of Mana.
It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

skills.name: Tactician's Advice A
skills.detail: Increase DEF (3 turns) & apply Incoming Damage Cut (3 turns) & slightly increase NP Gauge for all allies

skills.name: Emperor Xuan's Command A
skills.detail: Increase NP Gauge & ATK (3 turns) for one ally + Decrease your ATK (3 turns) [Demerit]

skills.name: Supreme Mystic Code, Volumen Hydrargyrum B
skills.detail: Apply Invincible (2 times, 3 turns) & increase Debuff Resist (3 turns) for one ally

buffs.name: Invincible
buffs.detail: Ignore Sure Hit and reduce ATK damage to 0

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds E

noblePhantasms.name: Unspoken Formation
noblePhantasms.detail: Greatly decrease DEF (3 turns) & decrease Critical Rate (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> for all enemies + Negate DEF disadvantage due to Class Affinity for all allies (3 turns) + Remove debuffs for yourself

buffs.name: Change DEF Affinity
buffs.detail: Negate the DEF disadvantage due to Class Affinity

comments.comment:
A military general and politician of the Three Kingdoms who was posthumously given the title of emperor.

...Or that's who she's supposed to be. Just like her rival and fellow tactician, she has manifested by using a certain mage girl's body as a vessel.

"While it is logical to yield one's consciousness to the vessel in order to operate here in the modern world... Aren't you being a little TOO logical?"

Height/Weight: 149cm, 42kg
Origin: Romance of the Three Kingdoms, etc.
Region: China
Alignment: Neutral-Balanced
Gender: Female
Height, weight, and gender are obviously all the vessel's stats.

The girl who acts as the vessel, Reines, is the original Lord of the El-Melloi family, one of the twelve families that operate the Mage's Association.

Under normal circumstances, she would have succeeded the previous holder of the Lord title. However, considering her age and the ensuing power struggle...as well as for Reines's own personal amusement, she transferred her position to Lord El-Melloi II. She has since taken to playing the mastermind in the background.

Upon becoming a Pseudo-Servant, Sima Yi left all operations in the modern world to the vessel, much like Zhuge Liang. However, unlike Zhuge Liang, who is more open-minded and rational, Sima Yi often rises to the surface.

Emperor Xuan's Command: A
A variation of the "Tactician's Command" skill given to Servants who were master tacticians. As Sima Yi was a usurper of authority, and because he was posthumously awarded the title of Ancestral Emperor Xuan of the Jin dynasty, the tactician and emperor skills have fused together.

Supreme Mystic Code, Volumen Hydrargyrum: B
One of the supreme Mystic Codes from the El-Melloi family of the Clock Tower's twelve houses. Expandable and elastic, it can transform into a powerful sword or impregnable armor capable of reinforcing its wearer's abilities. It can even turn into a maid composed of mercury if necessary. This ability originates from Reines, not Sima Yi. Her precise command of Volumen Hydrargyrum is said to exceed even her predecessor's. It is thanks to this Code that her STR is boosted up to B Rank.

『Unspoken Formation』
Rank: B++
NP Type: Anti-Formation
Range: 1 - 50
Maximum Targets: 500

Its proper name is the "Formation of Primordial Chaos". It is not in Sima Yi's nature to come up with cunning strategies. Whether it be during war or a power struggle, Sima Yi will position forces cleverly, will wait patiently, will win naturally, and will mutter some poetry that they detest while looking sullen.

When the illusory sun and moon appear from the horizon, the opponents will lose all advantage and instead have their hidden weaknesses exposed. As long as proper conditions align, such as if it is someone they have already defeated, or if the opponent's data has already been collected, this Noble Phantasm becomes a devastating strategy that creates weaknesses in the user's opponents.

Sima Yi was summoned as a result of Zhuge Liang having been summoned into Lord El-Melloi II. A sort of chain summoning, in essence... With the backing of Zhuge Liang's Noble Phantasm Chu Shi Biao, "Dispatch Troops," the chain summoning selected Sima Yi, who had ties to Zhuge Liang, and Reines, who had ties to El-Melloi II.

This is what brought Reines to Chaldea, and since she was the de facto Lord of the Clock Tower given a tremendous responsibility of her own, she is quite sympathetic to Master, who suddenly had the burden of being humanity's last Master thrust upon them. She typically enjoys Master's predicament, but when things are at their worst, Sima Yi's abilities are sure to make her a truly powerful ally.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Is anything the matter, my pupil?
Why did I just call you my pupil, you ask?
I wonder...
There may have been a time in the past or perhaps in another world's future where you were my pupil.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
My, you seem to come to me often.
Have you taken a particular interest in me?
Ha. Even if it's just to flatter me, it's nice to hear.
Well there's not much of interest here, but feel free to read any of the books lying around.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
This is slightly troublesome.
My desire to see you suffer grows exponentially as days go by. You know, like sadness or anger...those negative emotions that well up whenever someone finds themself going astray in life.
This disposition of mine just can't be suppressed.
Ah, what a conundrum.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hm. I thought I was intimidating you, yet you still come see me.
What? Because you're my pupil? Well, that's true.
...Very well. Brace yourself.
If you're going to maintain a relationship with me, you're going to have to alter your preferences and even your life to an extent.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
I've decided to hold a tea party today.
Hurry up and get ready.
Huh? Who am I going to have tea with?
Sheesh, don't make me spell it out after all this time.
What I want is to have teatime with YOU, my pupil.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hey, are you sure you want to be taking it easy?
Don't you need to go and do some quests to help humanity or something?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
You are a Master, and I am a Servant.
Let's make that very clear.
Making that distinction is important for Pseudo-Servants like me.
Oh by the way, can I send you off on an errand for me?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: It's so tiring to be in an elevated position sometimes, so it's nice to get ordered around once in a while.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I like?
I hesitate to even bring it up, but...seeing others' unhappiness.
All the better if a straitlaced person gets depressed and their entire life derails.
...Hey, you, don't be put off by that.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
A peaceful life, predictable outcomes, or unchanging developments are all things that I hate. Life's all about turbulence.
I expect suspenseful, spectacular, and even ridiculous situations like the ones in B-movies! 
Hm? Oh-ho. So Lord Sima Yi does not like literary works or poetry.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail, huh? There's nothing in particular I want to wish for.
It's not that I don't have desires...
Actually, I'm full of desires, but the things I want should be obtained through conspiring, strategizing, or scheming.
Basically I don't like people getting what they want just handed to them.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
I see that my brother is working hard even in a place like this.
If he could just be a little more carefree, he might smoke cigars less...
No, perhaps he's good the way it is...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 9
voiceLines.subtitle:
Aw shucks, that Luvia's a Divine Spirit...
Well, I understand why that happened to a certain degree, but even with that manifestation, she still has an over-the-top, luxurious, spoiled lady look...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh my, oh my. I can't believe that red devil ended up becoming a goddess.
Though it looks like some things never change...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
My goodness!
That Rin even has a summer outfit!
No, I know she's not Rin, but everything is so fitting in so many ways...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah yes. I'm glad Gray's here.
I know you're busy, Master, but at least you can spare time to have tea with us, right?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah, something's happening outside!
Come on, let's head out immediately! Time waits for no one!

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, so it's your birthday?
Well, you may not be happy to have a mage like me celebrating it, but let me just say this one thing:
Congratulations, my pupil!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_G010]Nice... I like the feeling of leveling up!
[id 403200_0_G011]I can feel my power overflowing... It's a shame you can't enjoy this.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_G030]Ohhh, so this is Ascension!
[id 403200_0_G031]My outfit's changed. What a breath of fresh air!
[id 403200_0_G032]Huh? Why am I in Western clothes, you ask?
[id 403200_0_G033]Well, obviously they suit my taste!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_G020]No outfit change this time, huh? 
[id 403200_0_G021]Hm? Did I want to change?
[id 403200_0_G022]Of course I do, since I'm a lady.
[id 403200_0_G023]It's only natural to want to change outfits based on one's mood!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_G040]Hehehe... Well I had to try on a Chinese outfit at least once in honor of Sima Yi.
[id 403200_0_G041]It's a bit hard to move around, but this elegant look is priceless!
[id 403200_0_G042]So, which do you prefer?
[id 403200_0_G043,403200_0_G044]I'm your Servant, so I wouldn't mind changing into Western or Chinese outfits to suit you!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_G050]Oh, okay.
[id 403200_0_G051]While I may be lacking in some ways as a Servant, I've still managed to come this far.
[id 403200_0_G052]That's all thanks to you.
[id 403200_0_G053]Humanity being so unstable right now is likely what's enabling our relationship, [delay 6.4]and I consider that to be a small miracle. I like this situation we find ourselves in though.
[id 403200_0_G054]And if, by chance, you should feel the same way...
[id 403200_0_G055]Ah, that would make me so happy...

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
[r]
Sima Yi makes an appearance... Well actually I'm a Pseudo-Servant using Reines El-Melloi Archisorte.

[r]
There's no need for you to worry. I've inherited all Sima Yi's powers.

[r]
Call me Reines, Sima Yi, or even Zhongda...whatever you wish.

[r]
A pleasure to meet you, Master.
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, so you've summoned me.
Sima Yi makes an appearance... Well actually I'm a Pseudo-Servant using Reines El-Melloi Archisorte.
There's no need for you to worry. I've inherited all Sima Yi's powers.
Call me Reines, Sima Yi, or even Zhongda...whatever you wish.
A pleasure to meet you, Master.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah, so you're here, my pupil!
Then let's get moving!

voiceLines.name: About the Event 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmm. How are you progressing?
I'll have you know that I'm a tough critic.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Dashing through patchwork cities full of bizarre and unusual mysteries to solve? 
This is just like the sort of computer game my brother would enjoy.
Though, I do like this sort of thing as well.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Be mindful of the whydunit.
Heroic Spirits and mages may not be bound by the laws of physics, but they cannot manipulate their own motives.
No matter how you put it, they are still human, after all.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Now then, have you read through all the information?
There have been a handful of problematic students in the El-Melloi classroom in the past who didn't do their reading...
Actually, maybe those who actually DID the reading were the rare ones...

voiceLines.name: About the Event 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Mystery solved.
All that must end, will, and Patchwork London will disappear along with the fog.
Ah, that was fun.
Don't forget to pick up everything you can.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
It was a great journey.
While our time in Patchwork London was indeterminable, one thing I can say is that the time I spent with you was unforgettable.
Well, I know that this memory will fade...but I want a bit longer with you to enjoy what precious time we have left...

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh-ho, it looks like you've gotten yourself something good.
Treasure it, my pupil.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
This is wonderful!
A truly superb item that would even be hard to get at the Clock Tower!

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
It looks like a new mission opened up.
Good luck!

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 4
voiceLines.subtitle: A new quest opened up. Exploring is one of the basics of being a mage, so I'd like my pupil to do their best.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 5
voiceLines.subtitle: There's progress in the case. Now, my pupil, head to the new site!

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
I hear you gained her trust.
Hehe, treat her well...

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah, so you've gotten this far.
The final area to explore has appeared.
Since you've been playing detective with me this far, I want you to stick with it till the very end.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
It's finally over.
To be honest, I was thinking about how I might extend this dreamlike time with you.
Well done, my pupil.
If you ever have the time, swing by the El-Melloi classroom. Should you do so, Gray and my brother will welcome you with open arms.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Now then! Shall we trample our enemies, Master?

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Miss, preparations for attack are complete.

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Yep, yep. Setting traps is so fun.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Come on, Trimmau, do your thing.

voiceLines.name: Skill 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Then I shall lend you my power as well.

voiceLines.name: Skill 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Miss, please use this.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Very well, let's try it!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: As you wish.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Huh. You want that?

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: This will be a moment to remember!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: I guarantee this will be good!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Miss, here you go.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Go!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Understood!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Take this!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Behold the ultimate Mystic Code of El-Melloi!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Volumen Hydrargyrum, moving in!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Damn, go easy on me!

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ngh! Ah!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Tsk, so this is it! I'm sorry!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Miss! My apologies!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: In battle, the outcome is what matters. That means this victory is due to all the work we have put in, Master.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Calculate, scheme, and entrap. That's the charm of being a tactician.

voiceLines.name: Victory 3
voiceLines.subtitle: That's right. Just assume your victory is a foregone conclusion...oh hey, Lord Sima Yi!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_B050]Seven holes are bored into primordial chaos. 
[id 403200_0_B051]There are poisonous women to great men. 
[id 403200_0_B052]Never is there a time when neither sun nor moon is set.
[id 403200_0_B053]Behold my tactics.
[id 403200_0_B054]Unspoken Formation!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_B800]Contests need neither stratagem nor trump card.
[id 403200_0_B801,403200_0_B802]All that is required is flawless preparation and victory.
[id 403200_0_B803]Unspoken Formation!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 403200_0_B810]Contests need neither stratagem nor trump card.
[id 403200_0_B811,403200_0_B812]All that is required is flawless preparation and victory.
[id 403200_0_B813]Unspoken Formation!
[id 403200_0_B814]This won't ever break!
